achievement.name: Lots Of Metal
achievement.description: Have 5 million metal.

achievement.name: Lots Of Energy
achievement.description: Have 1 million energy.

achievement.name: Lots Of Hacking
achievement.description: Have 1 thousand Hacking points.

achievement.name: Kills: Warrior
achievement.description: Kill 30,000 ships in a game.

achievement.name: Kills: Merciless
achievement.description: Kill 75,000 ships in a game.

achievement.name: Kills: Xenocidal
achievement.description: Kill 200,000 ships in a game.

achievement.name: Losses: In The Midst Of A Cold, Dark Winter
achievement.description: Lose 30,000 ships in a game.

achievement.name: Losses: For The Greater Good
achievement.description: Lose 75,000 ships in a game.

achievement.name: Losses: What Have We Done
achievement.description: Lose 200,000 ships in a game.

achievement.name: The Real Bloodbath
achievement.description: Lose and kill 100,000 ships in a game.

achievement.name: Getting Into This: 5 Hour Campaign
achievement.description: Reach a game time of 5 hours in a single game.

achievement.name: Nearing The End? 10 Hour Campaign
achievement.description: Reach a game time of 10 hours in a single game.

achievement.name: Long One: 15 Hour Campaign
achievement.description: Reach a game time of 15 hours in a single game.

achievement.name: We Didn't Start The Fire
achievement.description: Beat at least 2 AIs in Civil War mode.

achievement.name: The Fire Rises
achievement.description: Beat at least 3 AIs in Civil War mode.

achievement.name: The Flames Consume
achievement.description: Beat at least 4 AIs in Civil War mode.

achievement.name: A Terminal Problem (Bronze)
achievement.description: Hack the superterminal to reduce at least 30 AIP.

achievement.name: A Terminal Problem (Silver)
achievement.description: Hack the superterminal to reduce at least 50 AIP.

achievement.name: A Terminal Problem (Gold)
achievement.description: Hack the superterminal to reduce at least 80 AIP.

achievement.name: MUAHUAHUAHUAHUA
achievement.description: Claim a Botnet Golem.

achievement.name: The Way Home
achievement.description: Claim a Lost Spire Frigate.

achievement.name: Research Grant
achievement.description: Hack an Advanced Research Station to grant a new ship line.

achievement.name: Knowledge is Power
achievement.description: Hack an Advanced Research Station to reroll the ship lines it can provide.

achievement.name: FOR SCIENCE!
achievement.description: Hack an Advanced Research Station or Technology Vault to convert it into science.

achievement.name: Tech Tree
achievement.description: Hack a Technology Vault to unlock a new technology.

achievement.name: Library of Alexandria
achievement.description: Hack a Spire Archive to extract science.

achievement.name: So We're the Bad Guys Now?
achievement.description: Antagonize a Dyson Sphere through hacking.

achievement.name: This Will Definitely Make Things Better And Not Worse
achievement.description: Deliberately provoke the Dark Spire through hacking.

achievement.name: Abandon All Cookies Ye Who Enter Here
achievement.description: Keep hacking random mysterious homing beacons until something REALLY bad happens.
